trans-unit.source: Finvoice message can be used for invoicing and for other business messages, such as quotations, orders, order confirmations, price lists, etc. Due to easy adoption, it is suitable for invoicing between companies of all sizes and for consumer invoicing.
trans-unit.target: Finvoice message can be used for invoicing and for other business messages, such as quotations, orders, order confirmations, price lists, etc. Due to easy adoption, it is suitable for invoicing between companies of all sizes and for consumer invoicing.

trans-unit.source: Python module for generating Finvoice invoices
trans-unit.target: Python module for generating Finvoice invoices

trans-unit.source: Python module for generating Finvoice invoices.

trans-unit.source: This Python module is based on the XSDs released by the Federation of Financial Services, Finland.
